messageBody:
The other way to do it is to use a factory. Always pass the factory to
each object in the app that needs to create other objects.

Then when you want to substitute objects in a test, just subclass your
factory to return the correct mock object and pass in the new factory to
the object you are testing.

http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?search=factory
